excerpt: Curious to know the Duster Episode 7 release date and time? Check out all the details on that and more right here.

text: The Duster Episode 7 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episodes showcased Jim trying to regain Saxon’s trust, meanwhile an unknown enemy planned to silence them. Further, Nina ended up taking important steps to expose the mod. Jim and Genesis also crashed a mob wedding. Here’s all you need to know about the release date and time of Duster’s second-to-last episode, including how you can stream it online. When is the Duster Episode 7 release date & time? The episode’s release date is June 26, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S. Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeJune 26, 20259 PMPacific TimeJune 26, 20256 PM Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the action-adventure drama right here. Where to watch Duster Episode 7 You can watch Duster Episode 7 via HBO Max. HBO Max offers content from Warner Bros., DC, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, HBO, and more. Popular titles include Succession, The Last of Us, House of the Dragon, Dune, and Wonka. Fans can access all the episodes of Duster on the streaming platform after paying for a subscription. This is because HBO Max does not offer any free trials like some other streaming platforms. What is Duster about? The series showcases the journey of the first female Black agent in the FBI, known as Nina. She ends up hiring a skilled getaway driver, Jim, to fight against a criminal organization, leading to exciting twists and turns. The official synopsis for Duster is as follows: “In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
html:
The Duster Episode 7 release date and time are right around the corner. The previous episodes showcased Jim trying to regain Saxon’s trust, meanwhile an unknown enemy planned to silence them. Further, Nina ended up taking important steps to expose the mod. Jim and Genesis also crashed a mob wedding.

Here’s all you need to know about the release date and time of Duster’s second-to-last episode, including how you can stream it online.

When is the Duster Episode 7 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is June 26, 2025, and its release time is 6 PM PT and 9 PM ET in the U.S.

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in the action-adventure drama right here.

Where to watch Duster Episode 7

You can watch Duster Episode 7 via HBO Max.

HBO Max offers content from Warner Bros., DC, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, HBO, and more. Popular titles include Succession, The Last of Us, House of the Dragon, Dune, and Wonka. Fans can access all the episodes of Duster on the streaming platform after paying for a subscription. This is because HBO Max does not offer any free trials like some other streaming platforms.

What is Duster about?

The series showcases the journey of the first female Black agent in the FBI, known as Nina. She ends up hiring a skilled getaway driver, Jim, to fight against a criminal organization, leading to exciting twists and turns.

The official synopsis for Duster is as follows:

“In 1972, the first Black female FBI agent heads to the Southwest and recruits a gutsy getaway driver in a bold effort to take down a growing crime syndicate.”
